memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *pvName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: pvaDriver

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynOctet->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including AttributesFile. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Address of the string to write.
nChars
Number of characters to write.
nActual
Number of characters actually written.

This method calls the report function in the asynPortDriver base class. It then calls the NDArrayPool::report() method if details >5.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >5 then NDArrayPool::report and NDAttributeList::report are both called.
